caption.center: ALICE JAMES, RESPONDENT, v. R.B. FRASER and DAN FRASER, APPELLANTS.

posture.italic: Appeal from District Court, Big Horn County, Guy C. Derry,

opinion.opinion_text: Agreeably to stipulation of parties the appeal herein is dismissed as settled.
opinion.attorneys:
Messrs. Crippen Crippen, for Appellant.
Mr. G.E. Snell and Mr. M.J. Lamb, for Respondent.
